body.name: Cushion Lab Patented Pressure Relief Seat Cushion for Long Sitting Hours on Office/Home Chair, Car, Wheelchair - Extra-Dense Memory Foam for Hip, Tailbone, Coccyx, Sciatica - Light Grey

byLineInfo.name: Visit the C CUSHION LAB Store

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 8 hrs 40 mins
features: ✔ SPECIALLY SHAPED BY IN-HOUSE ERGONOMISTS the Ergonomic Seat Cushion is scientifically contoured to cradle your thighs & hip and help you sit upright up on any chair.
✔ ADD INSTANT COMFORT TO ANY CHAIR soft hip and thigh cushioning turn any chair into your personal throne. No more back pains or legs falling asleep!

✔ IMPROVE POSTURE, ALL DAY SITTING COMFORT ergonomic contours encourages proper posture and a straight spine, redistributing your lower body weight for comfort even during long hours of sitting. Great for driving, working, or wheelchair usage.
✔ ZERO PRESSURE SUPPORT proprietary extra-dense charcoal memory foam offers soft and velvety support while remaining odor-free in usage.
✔ WORK FROM HOME IN TOTAL COMFORT TODAY enjoy back & hip relief while working from home on any chair. If not satisfied, hassle-free full refund.
✔ DRIVER TESTED, TUSH APPROVED take the weight off your tailbone and lower back during long drives or road trips. Great for wheelchair and mobility scooter relief.
body.description: Make any chair you have at home your personal throne and start enjoying better comfort working from home.The Pressure Relief Seat Cushion is specially shaped by in-house ergonomists to provide soft contouring support to your hip and thigh, improve your sitting posture, and enhance comfort for extended sitting sessions.The unique split design helps distribute lower body weight evenly across and reduce lower back pressure for unparalleled comfort.Grippy Bottom helps secure the cushion without slippage as if it's built into the chair.Lumbar Pillow Paring the seat cushion pairs perfectly with our Back Relief Lumbar Pillow for the ultimate in WFH comfort from top to bottom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars ** It is a FIRM cushion BUT wait there's more!!
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased with my purchase. Well worth the money. It does come rolled up but it immediately decompresses as soon as you take it out of the bag. I did not notice or have not noticed any permanent creasing in the materials nor when I sit on this comfy cushion.I will say this. It is a very firm cushion compared to the others that I have tried.(Ex Serta and various gel seat cushions etc.)I have severe arthritis, herniated disc and nerve damage in my back down into my legs. This the hands down best seat cushion I have ever used!!It has relieved 90% of my pain while sitting.One key thing to be mindful of this cushion is THICK!!! But it's nice and it settles in nicely once you get adjusted to how it conforms to your butt.I did order the lumbar pillow immediately upon sitting on this cushion because due to the shape of the seat cushion it pushes me off the back of my chair because of the size and shape. *Not a deal breaker*But you will not be disappointed!!!!I'm hoping with ordering the lumbar cushion it will also help reduce pain and help my posture sitting at my desk and void the space the seat cushion creates.Honestly, it's probably a marketing tactic, but honestly I don't care.Did I mention this thing is super comfortable?Don't hesitate if you have back pain or any other type of pain associated with your hip region and legs or just want to have a comfy seat!!YOU FOUND IT!! 💯

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is all it claims to be. It is a wonderful relief for my sore tail bone. Yes it is pricey. But your comfort is worth it. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewerName: This is a really nice carry on. Small enough to travel with efficiently, yet roomy enough to fit a couple outfits and a pair of shoes. Nicely made too. I would recommend!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but expensive
reviews.reviewText: Not worth the money. It’s comfortable but I’m not sure how much it actually helps, especially for the money asked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a fantastic cushion for someone with joint pain. Comfy and roomy. It gives great support. It's definitely for use in an office setting, not in your kitchen as the fabric will easily pick up pet fur or crumbs. Other than that, it's well worth the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought it mid September and at first it was great. Comfortable, support just what I needed, Fast forward 3 months later and it has gone flat and is no longer comfortable. I reached out to the company and supplied them with a picture and they are happily replacing it. Great customer service to go with a great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Order Directly from Cushion Lab
reviews.reviewText: I have the same cushion at home that came directly from Cushion Lab & I notice a difference with this one purchased from Amazon. The one from Cushion Lab is firm with nice support & is more comfortable. This one is supportive as well, but it's harder & not as comfortable. I bought the Amazon one for work where I sit at a desk for 9 hours a day so I thought that it would "break in" but it's been over a month & it's still pretty hard. It's too late to return it so I'll probably swap it with the one at home. This one was about the same price as the one on Cushion Lab so I recommend buying directly from Cushion Lab. On the plus side, if I didn't have the other one to compare it to, this isn't bad. It has a nice grip on the bottom so that it doesn't slide all over my chair. It does boost me up some so I sit taller at my desk which has helped my shoulder pain. I type most of the day, so when I was sitting lower, my shoulders were bunched up causing pain. I also feel like I have better posture with the cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love it! I use this for my car because of the pain I get on my tailbone. It has helped me out tremendously! I recommend it! Also if you’re going to use this in your car just be ware that you’ll need to adjust your seat depending on the weather. In the winter here the foam gets a little stiff so I have to lower my seat. But no biggie. I still recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than the rest
reviews.reviewText: Due to medical reasons I have lost a tremendous amount of weight, more specifically in the rear. Sitting for extended periods of time became a painful process. I have purchased and tested a number of these cushions in the past finding that most will generally hold thier form and last for a few months if your lucky. The quality of this device is superior to any of the rest I have tried and am pleased that it is so durable yet comfortable.

Very comfy cushion, really conforms to your body and supports you. But regarding price, I'm not sure it's worth it. Bonus points for being able to remove the cover to throw in the laundry.Top notch, and maybe a bit more expensive. Might be able to search for one that is %50 cheaper, but not as good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have a Cushion Lab cushion that I have been using for 4 months here in the US. It is awesome and worth every penny. It is so good, I wanted to order one for my mum for her birthday. She is in the UK and there was only one option on Amazon UK (in the US there is a variety of colors and 2 sizes) and just going on the picture, it looks a little thinner than the one I have...but I cannot confirm this. I also work in International retail and I get it - we cannot offer the variety that we can in the US - so that didn't bother me too much - but holy hotcakes - DOUBLE the price??? Yes, 2 times what I paid. For that reason alone, I have dropped my star rating. My cushion lab cushion here in the US is completely awesome. My mum, who is 94, seems to like it - and I hope it is twice as good as mine :)

I bought their extra dense lumbar cushion and also bought this - it's changed my world. I have a couple of blown disks in lower spine and constant sciatica. These cushions have really worked for me. I upgraded my office chair to a secretlabs at the same time - but it's the lumbar cushion and seat cushion that have changed my world - these really help me sit and work without pain. Remarkable change over what I've been used to the last few years.

I have tried different seat cushion before with different material, this material seem to be the most supportive. I bought 31 for myself and two for gifts all positive feedback the only negative part is the price seems to be too high. Also, there should be quantity discount.
This product is well constructed with a removable cover and nonslip underside. It is filled with memory foam. Hopefully it will reduce pain in my sacroiliac. I'll let you know in a year or two.
